metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Automation powered by AI agents
metadata.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows.

hero.eyebrow: Stop wasting time on repetitive tasks
hero.subtitle: ZetisLabs builds custom automations that save you hours every week.

whatWeMake.title: What We Make
whatWeMake.description: ZetisLabs helps companies automate processes using intelligent agent-driven workflows. We build AI-powered automation solutions that transform how businesses operate.

aiAgents.title: Agents
aiAgents.description: We build programs that can understand the situation, make decisions, and take action to simplify your workflow.
aiAgents.shortDescription: Programs that make decisions to streamline your operations.

processAutomation.title: Automation
processAutomation.description: We develop complete systems that automate any repetitive task from start to finish.
processAutomation.shortDescription: End-to-end systems that run your repetitive tasks automatically.

intelligentWorkflows.title: Audit
intelligentWorkflows.description: We analyze your work methods to find where and how you can save time using automation or agents.
intelligentWorkflows.shortDescription: A clear analysis of your workflows to reveal where AI can genuinely save you time.

exampleProjects.title: Example Projects
exampleProjects.description: See how we've helped companies automate their workflows and save valuable time.

ecommerce.title: Mail sorting to notion
ecommerce.description: Sorting of incoming mail based on priority and destination, reducing the time spent sorting and improving accuracy. And place it in the notion database.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support Automation
customerSupport.description: AI-powered ticket routing and response system that handles common inquiries, freeing up support staff for complex issues.

dataMigration.title: Data retriever via human language
dataMigration.description: Retrieve data from a database with human language description.

devOps.title: Dev Ops
devOps.description: Convert natural language into API calls

you.title: You
you.description: Watch this video to hear our pitch

whyZetisLabs.title: Why ZetisLabs
whyZetisLabs.description: We combine cutting-edge AI technology with deep automation expertise to deliver solutions that work.

expertise.title: Expertise & Customization
expertise.description: We combine deep technical expertise with a bespoke approach. Every solution is tailored to your specific workflows, ensuring it fits your business perfectly.

scalability.title: Scalable & Secure
scalability.description: Built on enterprise-grade architecture that grows with you. Our solutions prioritize security and compliance while handling increasing complexity effortlessly.

results.title: Results & Partnership
results.description: From day one, see measurable efficiency gains. We don't just build and leave; we partner with you for continuous optimization and long-term success.

cta.title: Ready to Automate?
cta.description: Get a free audit of your workflows and discover how much time you could save with intelligent automation.
